name: Lamp (SirJamesD)
description:
This is my first game jam game. Didn't go as planned but hope you might be able to get a minute or two of fun.

RULES: You have two lights (press E/Space to switch between them). Area lights picks up presents and rotates them around you, and Hand Light pulls presents towards you. Put presents on mats to open up doors. Collect all the lightbulbs and return to the outlet to win!

Great experience either way!
